title: Split Pane Rendering - Layout Manager for Multi-Pane Display
description: Implement split pane rendering in the fugue client so that when a pane is split, both panes are displayed side-by-side (or stacked) rather than requiring manual switching with Ctrl+B o. Currently the client receives PaneCreated messages and stores pane data, but draw_attached() only renders the active_pane_id.
user_impact: Essential tmux-like UX where split panes are immediately visible. Without this, splits are confusing because users can't see their results.
